About Me

A few things about me...

BIO

I grew up in a small town, Washington NJ, spent my summers camping at Assateague Island. I am a huge New York Yankee fan, and Game of Thrones enthusiast.

High school Experience

In high school I took 3 computer science courses an introductional class, AP computer science, and an Advanced Topics class. This is when I started becoming highly interested in computer science and decided to continue with Software Engineering at Monmouth University.

Monmouth University

Software Engineering courses:
Requirements Engineering and Systems
Design
Formal Methods
Testing
Process Improvement
Human Computer Interaction
Introduction to Game Development
Engineering Web-Based Systems
Software Practicum

Skills

Hardware: Arduino, Prototype Breadboard Circuits, 3d Printing

Languages: Java, Python, Javascript, SQL, HTML and CSS

Frameworks: Ruby on Rails, Angular js

Software: VS Code, Git, StarUML, CAD, Eclipse, Adobe XD, Blue Jay, Mini Tab
